Notes: Common meetup phrase | Example: "Ahí nos vemos en el café a las 3" = See you there at the café at 3
Colombian way to say you're outside | Example: "No puedo hablar ahora, ando en la calle" = I can't talk now, I'm out and about

Common Bogotá complaint | Example: "Voy tarde, el tráfico está horrible" = I'm late, the traffic is horrible

Getting ready | Example: "Me estoy arreglando, llego en media hora" = I'm getting ready, I'll arrive in half an hour
